code: import axios from"axios";export const orderApis={getAllOrders:async params=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_BE_URL,"orders"),{params:params});return response;},getOrderById:async id=>{const{data}=await axios.get("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_BE_URL,"orders/").concat(id));return data;},addOrder:async order=>{const response=await axios.post("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_BE_URL,"orders"),order);return response.data;},deleteOrder:async id=>{return await axios.delete("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_BE_URL,"orders/").concat(id));},updateOrder:async(id,order)=>{const data=await axios.patch("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_BE_URL,"orders/").concat(id),order);return data;}};
